downloadTitle: System Center Management Pack for Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V
downloadDescription: ​Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V helps you monitor the health and availability of computers configured for Hyper-V server role and running Windows Server 2012 R2.

detailsSection:
​Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V helps you monitor the health and availability of computers configured for Hyper-V server role and running Windows Server 2012 R2.


Release History
  • 4/24/2015 - version 7.1.10107.0
  • 10/18/2013 - version 7.1.10104.0
  • 1/25/2013 - Original English release, version 7.0.8560.0

systemRequirementsSection:
• Other Software
    • This management pack is supported to run in System Center 2012 Operations Manager, System Center 2012 Operations Manager SP1, and System Center 2012 Operations Manager R2.
